prone.label: Prone
prone.summary: On the ground; disadvantage on melee defense; must spend an action or movement to stand (as per table text).

blinded.label: Blinded
blinded.summary: Cannot see; attacks and perception relying on sight are impaired.

deaf.label: Deaf
deaf.summary: Cannot hear; affected by sound-based effects differently.

stunned.label: Stunned
stunned.summary: Cannot act; loses actions for the specified duration.

silenced.label: Silenced
silenced.summary: Cannot speak or cast spells with verbal components.

entangled.label: Entangled
entangled.summary: Restricted by net/cord/obstruction; attack die penalties as per table.

immobilized.label: Immobilized
immobilized.summary: Cannot move; may also be unable to attack if specified.

disarmed.label: Disarmed
disarmed.summary: Dropped or lost weapon; must retrieve or draw a new one.

attack_penalty_next.label: Attack Penalty (Next)
attack_penalty_next.summary: Penalty to the next attack roll (see tag payload for value).

ac_penalty.label: AC Penalty
ac_penalty.summary: Penalty to armor class (see tag payload for value and duration).
